execution_plan.description: Get distinct users in the application database who have at least one post (user id, username, email).
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.email FROM users u JOIN posts p ON p.user_id = u.id;

execution_plan.description: Get distinct chat users who have sent at least one message, filtered to usernames found in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT u.id AS chat_user_id, u.username, u.full_name FROM users u JOIN messages m ON m.sended_by = u.id WHERE u.username IN ($step1.username);
